string: 1)  Isolate and purify cytotrophoblasts as previously described <sup>1</sup> with some modifications.
refer: as previously described refers to the method or procedure for isolating and purifying cytotrophoblasts that was mentioned or explained earlier in the text.

string: Remove the remaining leukocytes as previously described <sup>1</sup>.
refer: The phrase "as previously described" refers to a method or procedure that was mentioned or explained earlier.
